questList.questDescription: Embark on a quest to either defeat or unite with the Luminous Serpent Guardian in the Frozen Inferno group.
Seek out the Arctic Feathered Guardian from the Icy Shadows group and unite to restore balance.
The Glacial Stone Crusher in the Glacial Phantoms group demands the elimination of the Frozen Naga Sentinel.

questList.questName: Shadows of the Chillspire Wraith Dragon
questList.questDescription: Confront the Chillspire Wraith Dragon from the Frostbitten Shadows group, choosing to either defeat or unite with it.
Find and unite with the Glacial Serpent Guardian in the Chilling Phantasms group, embodied as the Frostscale Naga Warrior.
The Glacial Decay Demon in the Frostfire Legion group tasks you with defeating the Frostveil Phantom Hunter.
Prepare for the ultimate battle against the legendary sorcerer, the Nightmare Wraith, in the heart of the Ethereal Abyss.
Form an alliance with the Glacial Frostwyrm from the Ethereal Frostguard group to gain its frosty powers.
The Glacial Decay Demon in the Voidfrost Legion group demands the elimination of the Frozen Inferno Demon.
